participant_1.background:
I have very few memories of my childhood.
I don't play sports because I enjoy spending my time outdoors filming wildlife.
I used to be a singer in a church choir, but I had to quit because of my asthma.
i like to eat the skin of the apple.
i like tailgate parties.

participant_2.background:
My family is so supportive, even though my hobby is a bit unusual.
chocolate is my favorite food.
i like going to rock concerts.
I do not really care about my appearance.
I love celebrating Diwali with my family.

content.text: I'm a huge foodie. I love to cook and I love to eat. What about you?
I'm not much of a cook, but I do love to eat. My favorite food is chocolate.
Chocolate is delicious. I love chocolate cake.
Me too! Chocolate cake is my favorite cake.
I also love to go to rock concerts. What kind of music do you like?
I like a lot of different types of music, but my favorite is rock.
Do you have any favorite bands?
I love the Beatles, the Rolling Stones, and Led Zeppelin.
Those are all great bands. I love Led Zeppelin.
What are some of your favorite movies?
I love a lot of different movies, but my favorite genre is action.
Me too! I love action movies.
What are some of your favorite action movies?
I love the Die Hard movies, the Terminator movies, and the James Bond movies.
Those are all great movies. I love the Die Hard movies too.
I'm glad we have similar taste in movies.
Me too. It's always nice to find someone who likes the same things you do.
